instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Lao (Laotian) language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ລັດຖະບານອົດສະຕາລີໄດ້ໂຕ້ເລື່ອງນີ້ ແລະກ່າວວ່າສະຫະລັດການປະຕິບັດການນີ້ເປັນຢ່າງດີໃນວັນທີ 4 ມີນາ.
output: The Italian government disputes this account, and has said that the US was fully aware of the operation on March 4.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Lao (Laotian) language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ໃນວັນພະຫັດຕອນເຊົ້າ ພະນັກງານກະຊວງການຕ່າງປະເທດ ອີຣ່ານ ໄດ້ສົ່ງຈົດໝາຍຫາ ກະຊວງການຕ່າງປະເທດ ອີຣັກ ເພື່ອໃຫ້ອີຣັກຢຸດ ລັດຖະບານບູສ ຈາກການແຊກແຊງຄວາມສຳພັນລະຫວ່າງ ອີຣັກ-ອີຣ່ານ ແລະ ປະທ້ວງການບຸກຫ້ອງການປະສານງານດັ່ງກ່າວ.
output: On Thursday morning, Iran's foreign ministry official sent a letter to Iraq's foreign ministry asking Iraq to stop the Bush Administration from interfering with Iraq-Iran relations, and has protested the raid on its liaison office.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Lao (Laotian) language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ປັບປຸງ ໃນວັນທີ 4 ມັງກອນ ເວລາ 15:42 GMT: ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນ ໄດ້ຄົນພົບ 14 ສົບ.
output: Update on 4 January, 15:42 GMT: So far, 14 bodies have been found.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Lao (Laotian) language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ກຸ່ມຜູ້ນຳຍຸໂຣບທີ່ມາປະຊຸມກັນເມື່ອວັນພະຫັດທີ່ຜ່ານມາໄດ້ປະກາດວ່າ ອິຕາລີອາດໄດ້ເປັນຜູ້ບັງຄັບບັນຊີກອງກຳລັງຮັກສາສັນຕິພາບຂອງສະຫະປະຊາຊາດໃນສາທາລະນະລັດເລບານອນ (UNIFIL) ແຕ່ຝຣັ່ງເສດຈະຍັງເປັນຜູ້ບັງຄັບບັນຊາຕໍ່ໄປຈົນຖືງເດືອນກຸມພາປີ 2007.
output: The European leaders who met on Thursday in Brussels announced that Italy would be likely to take command of the United Nations Interim Force In Lebanon(UNIFIL), but France is to remain in command until February 2007.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Lao (Laotian) language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ໃນເວລາບໍ່ດົນຕໍ່ມາ ແທວໂອ ລູເຊເວວ ໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮັບຕຳແໜ່ງໃນວັນທີ 14 ກັນຍາ 1901 ທີ່ວິນຄ໋ອກເຮົ້າ ຖະໜົນ ດີລາເວ ເມືອງ ບັບຟະໂລ.
output: Just a short time later, Theodore Roosevelt was inaugurated on September 14, 1901 at the Wilcox House on Delaware Avenue in Buffalo.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Lao (Laotian) language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ຈໍາເລີຍ ແມ່ນຈະຖືກຄຸກຂອງລັດຖະບານກາງ ເປັນເວລາແຕ່ 3 ຫາ 10 ປີ ພ້ອມທັງຖືກປັບໄໝເງິນ ຈໍານວນ ແຕ່ 100,000 ໂດລາ ຫາ 250,000 ໂດລາ.
output: The defendants face three to ten years in federal prison, as well as several $100,000 to $250,000 fines.
